thread.section_title: Fortune - Fortune 500 Daily & Breaking Business News
thread.title: Marvel Unveils New Fantastic Four Series

author: Emily Price
title: Marvel Unveils New Fantastic Four Series
text:
Marvel is launching a new Fantastic Four comic book series. 
The continuation will include Mr. Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and The Thing as part of the current Two-in-One series, Comicbook reports. 
Marvel has hired Dan Scott and Sara Pichelli for the comic book project, with new books featuring the group expected out each month starting in August. 
— Marvel Entertainment (@Marvel) March 29, 2018 
The Fantastic Four hasn’t been published in comic book form since 2015, and many had suspected that Marvel was looking to discontinue the group, given that they are among the few Marvel characters that the company doesn’t have film rights to. SPONSORED FINANCIAL CONTENT
